sense.name: a very small pool of standing water
sense.examples: Mary stepped in a puddle in her new Ferragamo evening shoes. The dog splashed happily through the mud puddles. A puddle of light gathered at the foot of the stage. (metaphoric extension) He sat in a puddle of books on the floor of his study. (metaphoric extension)

sense.name: a clay mixture used as a watertight lining for embankments
sense.examples: We mixed sand and clay to form the puddle to hold the water for our man-made pool. The workmen used gravel mixed with sand to make a puddle for the Koi pond.
